display_information.name: AI Tools Sentiment Analyzer
display_information.description: Analyzes team feedback about AI tools from Slack channels
display_information.long_description: This bot reads messages from designated Slack channels to analyze sentiment about AI tools (Claude Enterprise, Claude Code, M365 Copilot, GitHub Copilot). It helps leadership make data-driven decisions by extracting themes, identifying pain points, and calculating perceived value scores. The bot is read-only and never posts messages.
